name: Northernbound
description:
-Overview-

Northernbound is the sequel of Northbound made for an old RPGMaker jam. The story takes place a few years after the events of Northbound but can be played even without having played the first title.

-Story-

We found Svend, Revna and Gorm, after many adventures, resting in a tavern as usual. Just when their lead on a treasure fade away a stranger points them to a new adventure. Now in the extreme North of the continent, the cold will be a challange even for them.

Credits
